meanings.definition: The act of dressing or adorning oneself in a showy or gaudy manner.
meanings.sent1: Her dizenments for the party included a sparkly dress and glittery shoes.
meanings.sent2: The performer's dizenments on stage dazzled the audience with bright colors and sequins.
meanings.sent3: She couldn't help but giggle at her friend's over-the-top dizenments for the school play.
meanings.sent4: The dizenments of the peacock in the garden made it stand out among the other birds.
meanings.sent5: The dizenments of the Christmas tree with ornaments and lights made the whole room festive.

meanings.definition: The clothing or accessories worn to create a showy or gaudy appearance.
meanings.sent1: In her closet, she had a collection of dizenments for special occasions.
meanings.sent2: The fashion show featured extravagant dizenments that caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: His dizenments for the costume party were so flashy that he won the best-dressed award.
meanings.sent4: The dizenments of the royal family were always opulent and eye-catching.
meanings.sent5: The dizenments of the bride included a stunning gown and sparkling jewelry.
